Geert Faber | LinkedIn

TERN International, TV Entertainment & Reality Network, is a brand new international company that will launch a new innovative factual entertainment television channel globally in 2015. TERN International goes beyond television, engaging audiences across all devices and platforms, anytime, anyplace, anywhere.
